review_title: Who is Medical Care Development and what is Healthy Lincoln County?
pros: Interview process was good, onboarding was good, HLC’s director was experienced in public health and mostly fair. Close to home
cons: MCD was a difficult organization to navigate. Working for a project of MCD called Healthy Lincoln County, it was challenging to understand the synergy between the two. I will speak to my experience with HLC as my relationship with MCD was purely a payroll agent. There was a considerable amount of misalignment with MCD/ HLC and it was difficult to know what program they would be taking on once grant funding was exhausted. Mission bleed was a common downfall! Top-down management, lack of diversity and investing in diversity training, lack of professional development for lower scaled employees. Job descriptions were not honored (hired and paid as an Admin Assistant but tasked with Program Development and Coordination).

pros: MCD is an origination that has let me grow and flourish.  I have been a part of many changes at MCD, during each phase I have seized the opportunity to achieve new goals and to grow.
